content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata record="2551"><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin role="Author">Brown, Jesslyn F.</origin><origin role="Cooperator">Wardlow, Brian D.</origin><title>Drought Monitoring with VegDRI</title><pubdate>2010</pubdate><serinfo><sername>Fact Sheet</sername><issue>2010-3114</issue></serinfo><pubinfo><publish>U.S. Geological Survey</publish></pubinfo><onlink>http://pubs.usgs.gov/fs/2010/3114/</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>The Vegetation Drought Response Index is a drought  monitoring and mapping tool integrating satellite observations of vegetation and climate with land cover, soil characteristics, and other environmental factors.</abstract></descript><accconst>none</accconst><useconst>none</useconst><keywords><theme><themekt>USGS Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>AVHRR</themekey><themekey>droughts</themekey><themekey>geography</themekey><themekey>hazards</themekey><themekey>land surface characteristics</themekey><themekey>mathematical modeling</themekey><themekey>scientific software</themekey><themekey>vegetation</themekey></theme></keywords></idinfo><metainfo><metd>20120904</metd><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Schweitzer, Peter N</cntper><cntorg>ER Mineral Resources</cntorg></cntperp><cntaddr><addrtype>mailing address</addrtype><address>12201 Sunrise Valley Drive Mail Stop 954</address><city>Reston</city><state>VA</state><postal>20192</postal><country>USA</country></cntaddr><cntvoice>703-648-6533</cntvoice><cntemail>pschweitzer@usgs.gov</cntemail></cntinfo></metc><metstdn>Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn><metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv></metainfo></metadata>
